node.title: Scores of protesters demand a drink at 'freedom pub' after anti-vax licensee convicted
node.alt: A woman holding a sign reading "we will never comply with tyranny".
node.description: Demonstrators waved placards decrying "tyranny" and called for "justice" outside Singleton Court. Inside, Bradley John Hill's matter was dealt with in five minutes.
node.content:
["A crowd of protesters cheered and shouted \"justice\" as the licensee of a Hunter Valley \"freedom pub\" emerged from court after being convicted for repeated breaches of COVID-19 health orders.", "Bradley John Hill, the 57-year-old licensee of the Caledonian Hotel in Singleton, waged a public campaign against COVID-19 vaccination requirements.", "Hill was hit with multiple penalty infringement notices in October for failing to comply with COVID-19 public health orders, which led to the temporary closure of the venue.", "He was later charged with two counts of allowing unvaccinated people into his pub.", "Hill was cheered into Singleton Court by a crowd of 80 protesters, some of whom held\u00a0signs criticising \"tyranny\" and \"discrimination\".", "", "
Bradley John Hill, left, said \"of course\" the crowd could drink at his pub after his court appearance.(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "Emerging after a\u00a0five-minute hearing, Hill told his supporters the matter was \"done\".", "\"I tried to read my statement and he would not listen,\" he said.", "Despite Hill's conviction minutes earlier, protesters\u00a0shouted \"justice\" before asking to drink at the pub.", "", "
The Caledonian Hotel, pictured in August, is situated on a corner of Singleton's main street.(Facebook)
", "
'Who are you?'
", "Inside court, Hill, who was not wearing a mask,\u00a0approached a microphone before immediately taking\u00a0issue with his identification.", "Magistrate Mark Richardson asked if he was Bradley John Hill, to which he replied, \"Mr Hill is not in the court, I am Bradley John\".", "\"Who are you? Why are you standing in the court?\" Magistrate Richardson said.", "\"You have no entitlement to be standing there.\"", "With the accused and Magistrate at loggerheads, Hill's name was called three times by the court sheriff before an application was granted to have the matter dealt with as if Hill were absent.", "He was convicted and fined $3,000.", "", "
The Caledonian's stance has divided opinion in Singleton.(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "
'Severe anxiety'
", "Police facts tendered in court detailed repeated breaches of COVID-19 public health orders at the Caledonian Hotel.", "Police attended the venue multiple times and warned\u00a0Hill about being in the hotel while unvaccinated and for failing to check the vaccination status of patrons.", "On October 15, Hill was \"was seated in the public bar on a bar stool and was consuming a schooner of beer with another person\", the document stated.", "", "
A group of police observed the protesters, who expressed a desire to drink at the \"freedom pub\" after Hill's conviction.(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "When police asked if he had updated his vaccination status, he said he had spoken to a doctor who had provided a letter.", "Police believed the letter did not meet the requirement under the Public Health Act and later that evening witnessed staff failing to verify\u00a0the vaccination status of patrons.", "", "
Fiona says she's lost work because of her stance on vaccination.(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "
'So unfair'
", "A protester outside Singleton Court named Fiona said she was a preschool educator and had been unable to work due to vaccination requirements.", "\"I'm here because this is so unfair, what's happening,\" she said.", "Another protester named Tony Sosich said he was at the courthouse to \"keep Australia free\".", "Clay Hill, who claimed to have organised of the protest,\u00a0said Bradley John Hill had\u00a0been \"victimised\" by NSW Police.", "He said he organised the demonstration via social media and that attendees had\u00a0travelled from Port Macquarie and Taree.", "", "
